scripts.setup:dev: cp .env.example .env && npm run install:all && echo '\nâœ… Setup complete! Edit .env with your API keys, then run: npm run dev'
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "sleep 2 && npm run client"
scripts.server: cd server && node -r dotenv/config server.js dotenv_config_path=../.env
scripts.start: cd server && node -r dotenv/config server.js dotenv_config_path=../.env
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run build:clean && rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.logs: tail -f server/server.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No server log found'
scripts.prod:build: npm run build && npm run build:package
scripts.prod:deploy: npm run prod:build && npm run start:prod
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:client && npm run docs:build:all && npm run docs:copy:all && npm run build:server && npm run build:config
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && mkdir -p ../dist/public && cp -r dist/* ../dist/public/
scripts.build:server: mkdir -p dist/server && cp -r server/* dist/server/ && rm -rf dist/server/node_modules
scripts.build:config: cp package.json package-lock.json dist/ && npm run build:dotenv
scripts.build:dotenv: [ -f .env ] && cp .env dist/ || echo 'No .env file found, skipping'
scripts.build:package: cd dist && npm ci --omit=dev && cd server && npm ci --omit=dev
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:clean && npm run build:client && npm run docs:build:all && npm run docs:copy:all && npm run build:server && npm run build:shared && npm run build:config && npm run build:package
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:update-version && cd docs && mdbook build
scripts.docs:build:all: npm run docs:update-version && npm run docs:build && npm run docs:build:markdown
scripts.docs:copy:all: mkdir -p dist/docs dist/exports && cp -r docs/book/html/* dist/docs/ && cp docs/book/pdf/*.pdf dist/exports/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp docs/book/iHub-Apps-Documentation.md dist/exports/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.docker:clean:all: docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
scripts.test:all: npm run test:quick && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:quick: npm run test:unit && npm run test:adapters
scripts.test:smoke: npm run test:adapters && npm run health
scripts.test:legacy: npm run test:openai && npm run test:mistral && npm run test:anthropic && npm run test:google
scripts.test:adapters: npm run test:openai && npm run test:mistral && npm run test:anthropic && npm run test:google
scripts.lint-format:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format:fix
